extendedInfo.description: Emerson Climate Technologies makes it easy to find the right part for your system. The competitive cross reference application is a user friendly tool that will cross a competitor's number over to the Emerson valve, control or system protector without worrying about having the right spaces, dashes or hyphens.Just choose from the manufacturer list first, and then the Product Type and then select the actual competitor's Model Number and the replacement Emerson valve, control or system protector will appear.

reviews.title: Nice going
reviews.comment: Emerson has taken advantage of technology once again. This app make finding replacements a breeze. Thank you Emerson.
reviews.author: Rob Shaffer

reviews.title: Customer Service C. C. Dickson Co
reviews.comment: Great for technicians to minimize down time finding parts. Technicians can now call their respective distributors with the part they need in hand. Stu
reviews.author: A Google User
